item.title: About Me
item.description: I am an Application Developer for the National Hockey League This site is built using Hugo static site generator. Site theme is terminal by panr. Site is hosted on AWS S3 Buckets using AWS Cloudfront to serve SSL certificates and AWS Lambda to clean the urls. Source code for site can be found here.
item.content:
I am an Application Developer for the National Hockey League

This site is built using Hugo static site generator. Site theme is terminal by panr. Site is hosted on AWS S3 Buckets using AWS Cloudfront to serve SSL certificates and AWS Lambda to clean the urls. Source code for site can be found here.
